“owu mama kotiyek“ yana wachana sahitha postarayak bala kadadasiyaka adinu laduwa kolambaa nagaraya pura alawi thibenu sathi dekakata pamana pera daknata labuni.postaraya aga demala bhashawen athsanak da yoda thibuni.ema pracharaka wyaparayema eelaga adiyara lesa “mama dan punaruththapanaya una“ yanuwen thawath postar watayak diyath wu athara me dinawala ehi awasana adiyara lesa “ mama dan selwam sinhala chithrapatiye naluwek“ yana wachana ragath aluth postarayak alawi thibe.
namuth ada dinaya thula thawath aasadithayin pokuru washayen nirmanaya wuwahoth ee gana wadi pramukhasthanayak laba diya yuthu bawada ee mahatha pawasiya.
waro paththare, meyage pissuwata ape eewa kapanna oonna.

aasiyanu mawuntan papadi shurathawaliya ha ‘rambal in da jangal’ jathyanthara mawuntan papadi tharagawaliya sandaha shri lanka kridaka kridikawan thora ganime tharaga mema 29 wani sanduda perawaru 9.00 sita walisara nawika hamuda resin dhawana pathayedi pawathwe.aasiyanu shurathawaliya nowambar masa 1 wanida indunisiyawe pawathwena athara ‘rambal in da jangal’ tharagawaliya nowambar masa 19 sita 22 dakwa nuwaraeliyedi pawathwimata niyamithaya.shri lankawa me tharagawaliyan sandaha pirimi ha kantha kanishta ha jyeshta washayen haya deneku idiripath kirimata apeksha karayi.

wishesha karya bhara amathi aacharya sarath amunugama, nagara salasum saha jala sampadana amathi rawuf hakim, nithiya ha samaya saha dakshina sanwardhana amathi sagala rathnayaka, sanwardhana upaya marga saha jathyanthara welanda amathi malik samarawikrama, agamathi lekam saman eekanayaka, chinaye shri lanka thanapathi aacharya karunasena kodithuwakku, agamathi athireka lekam saman athawudahetti, widesha katayuthu amathyanshaye nagenahira aasiyanu saha shanthikara kalapiya adhyakshika sawithri panabokke, widesha sampath departhamenthuwe wadabalana adhyakshika madara da silwa, agamathi wishesha sahayika sandra perera, chinaye shri lanka thanapathi karyalaye karya mandala pradhani shani karunarathna, amathya upadeshaka (aarakshaka) brigediyar thilak wirakon, upadeshaka (wanija) ruwanthi aariyarathna mahathma mahathmihu da me awasthawata ek wuha.

ee kale wedinwala ada wage pinthura ganna ekatayi widiyo karana ekatayi multhana dunne na,dan nan hanimun eka arenna anik siyallama ee tu ised widiyo karanawa,passe kalekadi hanimun eketh unusum kotas widiyo karayi kiyalath mata nikamata wage hithenawa ,magula sampurnayenma adhyakshanaya karanne poto kachar saha widiyo karayane...joduwa awidinne kanne bonne katha karanne wahaneta naginne pinthura ganna kattiya kiyana hatiyata,waradunoth aapahu shot eka gannawa...mama nan ehema karumekata ahuwune nathi nisa api apita oona widiyata awidda katha kala kawa biwwa poto karayoth apita karadara nokara ee gollange wade kala...
ethana unuth kawadda apita kek kiya kiya karadara karanawa..
dan loka saukhya sanwidhanayenuth kiyala thibena nisa mas anubhawaya gana dewarak hithannata ape rate wadidenek pelambaennata puluwan.

aanduwa kerehi pruthula mahajana aprasadayak liyalamin atha: loka dhanawadi aarthikaya aithihasika binda watimak kara ruta yana kondesi yatathe jiwana thathwayanta ha prajathanthriya ayithinta dhanapathi palaka panthin ella karana praharawalata wiruddhawa goliya panthi aragalaye ihala nagimaka kotasak lesa pasugiya wasare shri lankawe wishwa widyala anadhyana, dumriya, saukhyaya, jala sampadana saha wathu kshethrayanhi kamkaruwan ha guruwarun dasa dahas gananin aragalawalata awathirna wuha.
